channel.title: 软餐 - 新鲜软件资讯
channel.description: 软餐 - 新鲜软件资讯 - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub)

item.title: 电子书网站 Z-Library 主要域名再被查封
item.description:
软餐获悉，电子书网站 Z-Library 称其一个主要域名被当局查封，该网站因此遭遇技术问题，目前仍在努力恢复。该网站没有提及查封域名的当局名称。

亲爱的 Z-Librarians，

由于我们的一个主要域名被没收，我们正在经历一些技术问题。我们的团队正在努力恢复功能。
捐款的入账可能会有延迟，但请不要担心 – 系统将自动将其计入，并尽快升级您的账户为高级会员状态。
请注意，可能会有人冒充我们的图书馆进行欺诈活动，同时请记住，我们的网站不提供终身高级会员资格。该网站仍然可以通过以下链接访问：

  • singlelogin.re
  • singlelogin.rs

我们目前正在努力恢复我们的支持团队，以便他们能够回复您的所有消息。

The e-book website Z-Library has reported that one of its main domains has been seized by authorities, resulting in technical issues for the website. Efforts are currently underway to restore its functionality.

Dear Z-Librarians,

Since one of our main domains was seized, we are experiencing some technical issues. Our team is already working to restore functionality.

There may be delays in crediting donations, but don’t worry – the system will automatically credit them and upgrade your accounts to premium status as soon as possible.

Please pay attention to possible fraudulent activities on behalf of our library, and remember that our site does not offer lifetime premium status. The website is still available via the links below:

  • singlelogin.re
  • singlelogin.rs

We are currently working on getting our support team back up, so they can reply to all your messages.

Thank you for your understanding and patience ❤️

item.title: Netflix 宣布将推出《我的世界》动画剧集
item.description:
Netflix 宣布将推出一部围绕视频游戏 Minecraft（我的世界）的动画剧集。这家流媒体平台提到了一个 「带有全新角色的原创故事」。发布日期尚未公布。已释出的预告片展示了下界与爬行者的地下世界。这部剧集由加拿大工作室 WildBrain Studios 制作，该机构曾为 Netflix 制作过几部儿童剧集和《Sonic Prime》。此外，还有一部 Minecraft 主题电影正在开发中，杰克·布莱克（Jack Black）可能会扮演主角。

Netflix has announced the upcoming release of an animated series based on the video game Minecraft. The streaming platform mentions an 「original story with new characters.」 The release date has not been revealed yet. The teaser trailer showcases the Nether, an underground world, and a Creeper. There is no indication of the plot at this time. The animated series is being produced by Canadian studio WildBrain Studios, known for creating several children’s series and 「Sonic Prime」 for Netflix. Additionally, there is an ongoing development of a Minecraft-themed film, with actor Jack Black rumored to have a leading role.

item.title: Via 浏览器更新，新增复制标签页功能
item.description:
软餐获悉，以轻快简洁见长的 Via 浏览器最近发布了最新版本 Via Browser 5.6.1。该版本推出了多项新功能及改进。其中带来了 「标签页菜单复制标签」 功能。

Play 商店：https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=mark.via.gp

– 标签页菜单新增复制标签选项
– 主菜单新增其它应用打开选项
– 优化用户脚本的兼容性
– 脚本支持 data 协议的依赖资源
– 修复阅读模式下打印页面异常的错误
– 修复过滤规则可能被错误清空的问题
– 其它错误修复

item.title: [技巧] 屏蔽京东的广告电话/短信
item.description:
随着 618 的临近，各大电商平台开始了又一轮广告推送。这其中以京东尤甚。不仅 App 内各种推送，各类广告电话和短信更是连续不断，仅依靠电话/短信拦截功能效果不佳。读者可参照以下途径屏蔽。

  • 京东 APP-我的-账户设置-消息通知设置-营销短信
  • 京东 APP-我的-账户设置-隐私设置-广告管理/商业电话管理

需要指出，软餐的测试显示，单纯在 App 内设置仅能屏蔽一部分广告短信，如果你发现屏蔽不干净，需要进一步联系京东官方客服，他们将人工帮你标记处理。

item.title: 苹果 Apple TV+正开发安卓版本
item.description:
苹果发布的招聘信息显示，该公司计划将 Apple TV+服务引入 Android 手机和平板电脑。苹果正在寻找一位 Android 工程师，负责开发一款 「被数百万用户用来观看电视和体育赛事」 的应用程序。Apple TV+已在搭载 Google TV 的 Chromecast 和运行 Android 系统的智能电视上可用，但尚未支持 Android 手机和平板电脑。目前只有少数几款苹果应用程序为 Android 推出了适用版本，例如 Apple Music、Beats 和 Move to iOS 等。

Bloomberg: Apple is planning to bring its Apple TV+ service to Android phones and tablets. According to a job listing released by the company, Apple is seeking an Android engineer to develop an application 「used by millions to watch TV and sports.」 While Apple TV+ is already available on devices such as Google TV-powered Chromecast and Android-based smart TVs, it currently lacks support for Android phones and tablets. Apple’s decision to develop apps for other operating systems is uncommon, with only a few Apple applications, such as Apple Music, Beats, and Move to iOS, having versions available for Android. The timing of when the TV+ app will become available for Android phones remains unclear.
